name: Brewester
description:
A point-and-click game about harvesting herbs, berries and fruits from your yard outside your own potion factory and combine these to brew the most potent potions and remedies your customers are ordering!

Side note
This game is semi-completed, there is no win or lose conditions, just relax and make some potions in your own pace!

- Made for Ludum Dare 52
- Theme: Harvest
